description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Amsterdam 2016
http://gotoams.nl

Ray Tsang - Developer Advocate for the Google Cloud Platform
Arjen Wassink - Developer & Architect at Quintor

ABSTRACT
Join this session to learn how to create a Java-based microservice using Spring Boot, containerize it using Maven plugins, and subsequently deploy a fleet of microservices and dependent components such as Redis using Kubernetes.
Spring Boot makes creating microservices fast [...]
Download slides and read the full abstract here:
http://gotocon.com/amsterdam-2016/presentation/Java-Based%20Microservices,%20Containers,%20Kubernetes%20-%20How%20To

https://twitter.com/gotoamst
https://www.facebook.com/GOTOConference
http://gotocon.com
title: GOTO 2016 • Java-Based Microservices, Containers, Kubernetes - How To • Ray Tsang & Arjen Wassink
